text:
Hi Ryan. I've only done one Custom Quote template and it's a little while back now, last year maybe (what is time anymore??). I think it's still in Beta so chances are bits and pieces have changed since then.

Anyway, there's a forum for it here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Custom-Quote-Template-Beta/gh-p/cpq-beta>

There's also documentation on the variables: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables/quotes>
If I delete a folder from design manager that has files that have live dependents, do those assets break immediately on the live dependents, or are they cached for a period of time? If so, how long?

I don’t know if it also applies to images, but in my opinion it is the case that modules no longer work on live pages…. But that was also before themes when i had this issue, so this might have changed

hey everyone! I’m trying to import customer data and one of the columns in my spreadsheet has true/false values for “unsubscribed from all email” property. However, HubSpot does not accept it because apparently it’s a read-only property. Is there any way to get this data in without importing unsubs as a suppression list?

Hi everyone! I'm trying to make a contact record in an event. Does anyone know what values are accepted in the 'subscriberState' field? I'm sending a string with only the word 'subscribed' and the documentation says a string value is allowed. Any ideas?
`{"status":"error","message":"Unknown state for 'subscribed'","correlationId":"4e4b270b-2df3-4fb5-b067-27fd37765e78"}`

I assume we’re able to view page analytics for dynamic HubDB generated child pages like we would be able to if they were normal pages? For instance, we have a HubDB dynamic page with slug `some-dynamic-listing` and we want analytics from one of its subpages, i.e. `some-dynamic-listing/example-1`? Can anyone confirm/deny, and tell me how to access them? Thanks.

Thanks! Will check out the community. Everything works fine so far. I just wanted an added feature - adding fields that users can input data and have that data be displayed when the quote is downloaded into PDF.

I am working with HubSpot serverless functions and am having trouble with being able to renew a 3rd party oAuth token at a set interval since the token exipres every 30 min. I can generate my token once just fine but if I try to add anything like a javascript setinterval in my function that generates my token, I get the following errors in the hs logs:
UNHANDLED_ERROR - Execution Time: 575msTypeError: Callback must be a function. Received ‘getToken()’

my question is how can I make it so that my oAuth script runs every 30 min so that I can use my serverless function to pass along that third party token to where I need it to go?

Hello everyone. I'm adding subscribers to marketing events with email-upsert, everything looks fine, I don't get any errors, but when I make a POST request, it throws a 202 response and no error is shown. Any solution?
